snippet: Seeking to make their rankings more useful for mutual fund investors, some industry scorekeepers are trying some look-ahead analysis.
abstract: Ratings industry is looking to make data and rankings on mutual funds more useful with new tools and scales for analysis; companies like Morningstar and Standard & Poor's are making changes that reflect a growing belief that performance figures by themselves do not fully capture a fund's investment prospects.
lead_paragraph: Seeking to make their rankings more useful for mutual fund investors, some industry scorekeepers are trying some look-ahead analysis.

headline.seo: For Mutual Funds, a New Effort to Improve Rating Systems
headline.main: Fund Ratings That Take Aim at the Future
headline.print_headline: Fund Ratings That Take Aim At the Future
